def_cn: (发动机)发出噼啪声;(火焰)发出毕剥声
def_en: If something such as an engine or a flame sputters, it works or burns in an uneven way and makes a series of soft popping sounds.

def_cn: (过程、行动或事态)缓慢不稳地进行，慢慢结束
def_en: If a process, action, or state of affairs sputters, it progresses slowly and unevenly or starts to end.

def_cn: (尤指因生气、震惊或激动)结结巴巴地说话，语无伦次地说话
def_en: If you sputter, you speak with difficulty and make short sounds, especially because you are angry, shocked, or excited.
